parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To mingle with myrrh. From Smurna; to tincture with myrrh, i.e. Embitter.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
